1.title: Bethenny & Fredrik Inc.
1.plot: Fredrik invites Bethenny to see what could be their first potential investment property together as business partners. Bethenny fears it could be more of a money pit than a successful flip and both are left wondering if business and friendship can actually mix.

2.title: The Proof is in the Porcelain
2.plot: Bethenny and Fredrik break the news of their partnership to the design team, but not before Bethenny's surprise guests cause some tension amongst the group. With new budget cuts happening, Fredrik is forced to make some major compromises. Meanwhile Bethenny is back in the dating pool with Fredrik as her matchmaker.

3.title: Hitting the Pavement
3.plot: With construction underway, Fredrik and Bethenny embark on the search for their next investment property. But Fredrik's choice of apartments and upcoming travel plans make Bethenny question how serious he's taking their new venture.

4.title: Tribecalvania
4.plot: With Fredrik away in Africa, Bethenny views a potential investment property with Fredrik's assistant Jordan. Tensions arise when Fredrik finds out, and confronts Bethenny. Meanwhile Fredrik and his husband begin to prepare for the arrival of their twins.

5.title: Beach Retreat
5.plot: After Bethenny and Fredrik's property hunt in Manhattan comes up short, they move their search to the Hamptons. When the press releases a photo of Bethenny on a date, her ex-boyfriend resurfaces. And a night of debauchery ensues as Bethenny and Fredrik face off in a dance competition.

6.title: He Said, She Said
6.plot: Bethenny starts to question Fredrik's motives when some unexpected numbers arise in their renovation budget. Things get heated when Fredrik is confronted, and a blow up fight jeopardizes the future of their relationship.

7.title: Finish Line
7.plot: Bethenny and Fredrik are forced to kick into high gear in order to meet their renovation deadline. Fredrik flexes his construction muscles while both shop for a porcelain throne. With time running out, Bethenny and Fredrik hope the apartment can be staged and finished in time.

8.title: All About the Benjamins
8.plot: With Bethenny and Fredrik's renovation coming to an end, they prepare to put the apartment on the market; Fredrik celebrates the pending arrival of his twins; Bethenny and Fredrik's design choices are put on display at their first open house.

imdb.plot outline: These two powerhouses are well-respected in their individual fields. Bethenny Frankel is a self-made businesswoman who founded Skinnygirl Cocktails and expanded the Skinnygirl brand into a lifestyle empire. Fredrik Eklund is one of the top real estate entrepreneurs in New York City, with more than $5 billion in residential sales over the past 11 years. Together they'e got big ambitions to renovate properties and make a huge profit. With millions of their own money on the line, along with years of friendship, they tackle the ups and downs of scouting, buying, and designing multimillion-dollar homes. Putting two big personalities on the same job definitely creates a lot of funny moments, but it also comes with plenty of challenges as they try to stay on the same page. Beyond finding the properties to flip, they have to balance Fredrik's caviar taste for furnishings with Bethenny's penchant for staying on budget. Can they navigate the crazy world of real estate while maintaining their personal lives, all without killing each other?
